name: Cactus
description: A turbine performance simulation code, based on a free wake vortex method, to study wind turbines and marine hydrokinetic devices.

SDGs.evidenceText: A turbine performance simulation code, based on a free wake vortex method, to study wind turbines and marine hydrokinetic devices in order to lessen the impact on the climate.
A turbine performance simulation code, based on a free wake vortex method, to study wind turbines and marine hydrokinetic devices in order to lessen the impact on the climate.
